DOC.brief_title: Urodynamic Effects UK-369,003 Men With Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Male subject , age 40 year , document LUTS International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) ≥13 . Clinical diagnosis BPH Qmax 5 15 ml/sec void volume ≥150 ml Urodynamically define bladder outlet obstruction prostate cancer Postvoid residual urine volume > 200 ml Documented UTI History relevant urological surgery
